title: Live in Iowa City
teaser:
A special live edition of The Moth at The Englert Theatre in Iowa City hosted by Peter Aguero, with additional hosting by Jay Allison. An activist finds himself sitting down to an awkward meal, a woman recalls her first kiss, and a Vietnam veteran battles with her identity.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole, Massachusetts
contentencoded:
Jim Bennett rides RAGBRAI as part of Lambda Legal team and samples Iowa’s “ham balls.”

Stephanie Summerville recalls the summer of her first kiss and her father’s sudden illness.

Janice Josephine Carney is a Vietnam veteran who finally feels at home in her body.
